**2022-01-12 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons**

**Accepted**

- none

**Declined**

- **net/http: add Unregister method to ServeMux** [#50056](https://golang.org/issue/50056)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **net: add Listen and Dial for TCP and UDP that takes an AddrPort** [#49522](https://golang.org/issue/49522)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **io/fs: add ReadLinkFS interface** [#49580](https://golang.org/issue/49580)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳
- **x/exp/typeparams: a new module with a transitional API for tools** [#50447](https://golang.org/issue/50447)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ⏳

**Likely Decline**

- **constraints: rename package to "of"** [#50348](https://golang.org/issue/50348)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ⏳
- **x/crypto: kbkdf** [#50136](https://golang.org/issue/50136)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ⏳

**Active**

- **archive/tar: add FileInfoHeaderNoNames** [#50102](https://golang.org/issue/50102)
  - commented

  - added to minutes

  - added to minutes

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing

  - added to minutes

  - added to minutes

  - commented

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing

  - added to minutes

  - commented

  - commented

  - added to minutes

  - commented
